attributes.additional_details:
The postcode lottery is very much being highlighted now as vaccines are rolled out for Covid across the Country.
Each health Care Commissioning Group, indeed each Surgery, is dealing with priorities for vaccines very differently.
An example of this is that a Carer who travels from her hometown to place of work has had to apply to her local CCG for a vaccine when all other Carers she works with were vaccinated with their first dose on Friday 22nd January.
attributes.background: Standardise the NHS system in this Country.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
